channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia, Google, Microsoft and more head to Las Vegas to tout health-care AI tools
item.description: Tech companies are in Las Vegas this week to talk health-care AI at the HLTH conference.

item.title: Gen Z teens feel crushing pressure to achieve. 6 ways parents can fight it, not fuel it
item.description: “Achievement is not the problem,” says one expert. “It’s the way that we’ve come to talk about achievement.”

item.title: You’ll never guess which American president was the best with money
What went wrong at CVS? Departing CEO Karen Lynch’s reign started brilliantly, then unraveled fast
item.description: A trifecta of problems, some that started before she took the top job, ended the reign of one of the most powerful women in American business.

item.title: These 3 issues sent a retired couple back to the U.S. after a move to Portugal
D.E. Shaw, Mantle Ridge zero in on key fixes to build shareholder value at Air Products
item.description: Both activists want to address CEO succession planning and capital allocation at the company.

item.title: Drug costs, abortion, Obamacare: How Trump and Harris could change U.S. health care
item.description: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are both pledging to make health care more affordable in the U.S., but have largely different approaches to doing so if...

item.title: Trump’s favorite word is a big talking point for European CEOs
item.description: Mentions of "tariff" on earnings conference calls so far this period have soared in Europe, outpacing instances on US calls by a ratio of 5 to 2 in Oc...

item.title: Here's why inflation may look like it's easing but is still a huge problem
item.description: By nearly every barometer, inflation is still well above where most Americans, and in fact some Fed officials, feel comfortable.

item.title: Amazon employees gripe about their work culture on social media
item.description: “Instead of the exciting, fast-paced environment I remember, I experienced a place bogged down in pointless meetings and middling middle managers.”

item.title: How rookie stars like Caitlin Clark helped grow the WNBA in 2024

item.title: U.S. budget deficit in fiscal 2024 swells to third-highest level on record

item.description: A deal-hunting mindset, volatile weather and election distraction could influence holiday spending this year.
